attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When for example all four enterances to a mini roundabout is occupied everyone looks at eachother because technically there is no right of way. I think there should be a something like a large red square painted on one of the roads to say THIS PERSON HAS RIGHT OF WAY in this situation. There have been so many accidents where everyone tries to go at the same time, even people get knocked down!

rejection.details: Please re-submit without the use of block caps.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
